episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_0100:
Oh, wow! Look at all that snow! Isn’t it
perfect for the winter soiree?
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_0200:
The Trainers and Pokémon here sure have been in
high spirits today!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_0401_0400: Oh, me? I’ve been looking forward to today, too!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_0302_0500: You look pretty happy too, Sonia!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_0402_0600:
Oh, you can tell? Actually, I was really looking
forward to today.
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_0700:
You may already know this, but Leon and I are
childhood friends. We also met Nessa during our
Gym Challenge.
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_0800:
We all traveled around Galar at the same time,
so it’s like we grew up together, really.
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_0900: But we’ve all been too busy to hang out lately...
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1000: So I’m looking forward to seeing them today!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1100: I was so excited that I left work earlier than usual!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1400: Rejoice in the festivities and Pokémon battles!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1500:
As for the presents, these sync pairs will be
delivering our gifts this year!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1600:
Delivering gifts to everyone on this large
island is an important job!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1700:
I’ll be sure to deliver everything safely and bring a
smile to everyone’s faces!
episode_event_winter_2021/4001_1001_1800: I hope you’re all looking forward to it!
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0100: Wait, what? I didn’t hear about this!
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0300:
I didn’t know you two were going to be delivering
presents for the winter soiree!
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0400: Didn’t you get the message on your Poryphone?
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0500:
Or maybe you were so engrossed in your research
that you didn’t have time to read it?
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0600: Oh! Actually, now that you say that...
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0800:
And we didn’t have enough time to tell you in
person, either...
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_0900: I suppose that can’t be helped.
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1000:
We’re all working so hard to make our dreams
come true, after all.
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1100:
It’s a good thing to be busy with work, especially
if it’s something you like!
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1200: I guess it just didn’t work out this time.
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1400:
What’s wrong, Calyrex? Did you want to get
started on delivering presents already?
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1500:
Yeah, I suppose we should get a move on! See
you later, OK, Sonia?
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1700:
*sigh* [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Looks like I haven’t got any plans today after all.
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1800:
And you know what? There’s loads of work to get
done, so maybe I should just go home already—
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_1900:
Whoa! What’s up with you all of a sudden,
Yamper? Do you wanna play?
episode_event_winter_2021/4002_1001_2000:
You’re loving the snow, huh. Why don’t we go for
a nice walk, then?
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0200:
Nessa? I thought you were still out delivering all
those presents.
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0300:
Yup, I’m still working on that. But don’t forget
that you get a present, too!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0400:
Wow, thanks! Good luck on delivering the rest
of them!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0500: Say...do you have any plans after this?
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0600:
Me? Well, I’ve still got a lot of research to do,
so I was thinking of calling it a day...
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0700:
I thought you might say that. But I was really
hoping to hang out with you and Leon today.
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0800: I...I’d like to do that, too!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_0900:
But since you’re both busy today, I figured it’d be
best not to get in the way...
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1000:
To tell you the truth, I actually am feeling kind of
lonely... Because it feels like we all keep drifting
further apart.
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1100:
Um... Actually, I’ve got a little something for
you, too.
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1200: Oh, wow! Is this what I think it is?
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1500:
Every time I lost at Motostoke Gym, we’d head
over to the Battle Café, and I’d ask you and Leon
for advice!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1600: We really ate a lot of these, come to think of it!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1700:
I was hoping we could share this one at the
winter soiree! With Leon too, of course!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1800:
Also, we still haven’t celebrated you becoming
a professor yet!
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_1900:
As your best friend, you’ve got to let me do at
least that much, right?
episode_event_winter_2021/4003_1001_2100: Thanks! Let’s eat it together, then!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0100:
By the way...what happened to your
partner, Eiscue?
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0400:
Um... Was Eiscue just fishing with the hair on
his head?
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0500:
Uh-huh. Once he starts, he won’t budge from that
spot, so I figured I’d come talk to you for a bit.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0600:
It’s so silly, because there aren’t any wild Pokémon
to fish for here on Pasio!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0700: I told him that myself, but he’s so stubborn...
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0800:
Really, you’re the one saying that, now? Didn’t you
do the exact same thing before, too?
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_0900:
Yeah, I remember that! I kept trying to fish in a
spot you told me didn’t have any Pokémon!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1000:
And in the end, I didn’t get a single bite. I guess
I should’ve listened to a future Pokémon
Professor, huh.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1100:
Y’know...to be honest, I’ve been worried about
some things, too.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1200:
I decided that I was going to be equally invested
in both modeling and being a Pokémon Trainer.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1300:
But in the Galar Gym Challenge, my Gym is the
second that challengers visit...which means I’m still
not as strong as I’d hoped.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1400:
I still can’t seem to beat Leon...and I have to
admit, I felt some pressure when I heard you’d
already became a Pokémon Professor!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1600:
But right now on Pasio, I’m getting exposure to all
sorts of Trainers and experiences!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1800:
and Lana likes fishing, too, so we get along
quite well.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_1900:
I totally get that! There’s a lot of veteran Pokémon
Professors here on Pasio, too!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_2000:
Ever since I got here, I feel like I’m getting back in
the groove for battling again!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_2100:
Oh, really? In that case, I’d love to challenge you
to a match as well.
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_2300:
Sure! Once things calm down a bit more, let’s
have ourselves a nice battle!
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_2400:
Hm... Where on Pasio has Leon gone to deliver
those presents?
episode_event_winter_2021/4004_1001_2500:
I hope I can find him so I can give him these
extra deliveries!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0100:
Come on, Calyrex! No time to rest—let’s deliver
the next present!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0300:
I guess we are overdue for a break with how
fast we were going.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0400:
Why don’t we head back to where everyone
else is?
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0600: No wonder I couldn’t find you!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0700: I thought I heard someone calling out for me!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0800:
It’s my job as Champion to make an appearance
whenever I’m called!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_0900:
Hm? What’s wrong, Calyrex? Excited
about something?
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_1000:
That’s a fine crown you’ve got there. Perhaps one
day the young master will also have one, too...
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_1600: Ah, yes. A sturdy body, just as I expected.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_1700:
I hope he doesn’t mind that I make use of it for the
time being.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_1900:
Verily. I must say that I am impressed at your 
composure in this situation... Though I suppose
that’s indeed why you are a Champion.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2000:
I have borrowed this man’s body in order to
have a word with you in person...so to speak.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2100: Your strength is befitting of a king.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2200:
However, I do see how such strength may perhaps
become a burden to you.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2400:
You always force yourself to live up to the
expectations of those around you...and you
busy yourself with fulfilling these obligations.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2500:
This is a remarkable quality of yours—indeed, it is
perhaps the reason why you’ve been a crowned
Champion for as long as you have.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2600:
However, the further you push yourself to greater
heights, the harder others will struggle to keep
up with you.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2800:
You should reflect on this...as once something
precious has been lost, it may be too late to
get it back.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_2900:
By isolating yourself, you may be making
others lonely.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3000:
It takes a significant amount of time and effort to
regain what has once been lost.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3100:
And remember, it is also possible that something
lost may never return.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3300:
Thanks, Calyrex! You really have been looking out
for us all this time, haven’t you.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3400:
It was never my intention to make anyone sad
or lonely.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3500: But that said, I am a Champion.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3600: No matter what happens, that’ll never change.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3700:
So making time for the people important to
me is also my duty as Champion!
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3800:
Not to worry. I was thinking of ways to make it
work out, too.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_3900:
I did notice that you seemed to be in a hurry while
delivering your presents.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_4100:
Very well. I will do my best to support you in
this endeavor.
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_4300: Did I just nod off? Have I been working too much?
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_4400:
Sorry ’bout that, Leon. But anyway, could you help
us deliver these extra presents, too?
episode_event_winter_2021/4005_1001_4600:
OK. Time to show everyone how the unbeatable
Leon gets the job done!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0100:
Thank you for joining me today, Sonia. It’s a bit
embarrassing to eat sweets all by myself...
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0200:
I don’t think it’s anything to be embarrassed about,
but either way, glad I could help!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0300:
I’m pretty sure most people just thought I roped
you into joining me for some dessert, anyway!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0600:
Um... If you don’t mind me asking, are you thinking
about Leon and Nessa?
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0700: Huh?! Um, no, it’s nothing like that...
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0800:
Once they’re done delivering presents, you have
plans to meet up with them, right?
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_0900:
Don’t worry. This is just my intuition speaking, but
I’m sure they’ll make it in time.
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1100: Sorry to keep you waiting, Sonia!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1200:
L-Leon? You’ve finished delivering all those
presents already?
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1300:
Yeah! Thanks to Calyrex pitching in to help, we’ve
finished in record time!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1400:
After all, today’s a rare chance for all of us to
be together!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1500: And...well, I’ve also got this for you.
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1600: Oh my gosh! A new lab coat?!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1700:
I wasn’t sure what to get you, but I figured this is
something you’ll definitely need!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1800:
Sorry it’s late, but congrats on your promotion to
Pokémon Professor, Sonia!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_1900: And also...thanks for always helping me out!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2000:
Whoa, what’s all this about all of a sudden?
You’ve never done anything like this before!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2100:
I was thinking of waiting until things calmed down
a bit for you, but the way things are going, that
doesn’t seem likely!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2200:
So it ended up becoming a winter soiree gift
instead, but...
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2300:
You really always helped me out, so I wanted to
make sure I could give this to you in person!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2400: Oh...thank you, Leon! This is so thoughtful.
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2500:
We’ve been busy and haven’t been able to
hang out lately, but I’m so glad nothing
has changed!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2800:
Of course I’ve got presents for you, too! Every
Galar Trainer deserves a little something for the
hard work you all do!
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_2900:
Why don’t we grab a table and have ourselves
a nice, long chat over some tea?
episode_event_winter_2021/4007_1001_3000:
We could reminisce about all of the unbeatable
Leon’s rookie mistakes from back when he was still
a bright-eyed Gym Challenger!
